sources.title: The Forgiven | Full Movie | Urban Crime Drama | Zion Akande
sources.description:
The Forgiven - Twenty years after the horrors of a West African civil war, Reverend Brian William confronts his past when his wife and daughter are kidnapped.
2016. Stars: Donna Adja, Zion Akande, Michael Sean Erickson

metadata.Plot: A fatal accident disrupts the lives of Western visitors to a lavish party in the High Atlas Mountains of Morocco, and will ultimately lead to a reckoning in the desert.
metadata.Actors: Aissam Taamart, Omar Ghazaoui, David McSavage
metadata.Country: United Kingdom, Canada, United States, Morocco
